  <description>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_86934</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_86934</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Obtenir du pétrole de la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Getting oil from the ground</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erhalten des Öls vom Boden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Começando o óleo da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ottenendo olio dalla terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να πάρει το πετρέλαιο από το έδαφος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conseguir el aceite de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme illustre comment le pétrole et l'eau  se déplacent à travers des espaces minuscules dans les roches et comment  obtenir du pétrole par le forage à travers la couche imperméable sous la  terre.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates how oil and water move through the tiny spaces in rocks and how to get oil by drilling through the impermeable layer under the ground.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">forant</string>
            <string language="en">drilling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la terre</string>
            <string language="en">ground</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">couches imperméables</string>
            <string language="en">impermeable layers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">huile</string>
            <string language="en">oil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">perméabilité</string>
            <string language="en">permeability</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">roches</string>
            <string language="en">rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">l'eau</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, wie Öl und 
Wasser durch die kleinen Platz in den Felsen bewegt und wie man Öl 
erhält, indem sie durch die undurchlässige Schicht unter den Boden 
bohren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra como o óleo e a água se 
movem através dos espaços minúsculos nas rochas e como começar o 
óleo perfurando com a camada impermeable sob a terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra come il petrolio e l'acqua 
si muovono attraverso gli spazi molto piccoli in roccie e come 
ottenere l'olio perforando con lo strato impermeabile sotto la terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί πώς το έλαιο και το ύδωρ 
κινούνται μέσω των μικροσκοπικών διαστημάτων στους βράχους και 
πώς να πάρουν το πετρέλαιο με τη διάτρυση μέσω του στεγανού 
στρώματος κάτω από το έδαφος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra cómo el aceite y el agua 
se mueven a través de los espacios minúsculos en rocas y cómo 
conseguir el aceite perforando con la capa impermeable bajo tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bohrung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Boden</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">undurchlässige Schichten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Öl</string>
          </keyword>
